solution_line_template: 75% of the {total_holes} holes in Maynard's lawn, or ({filled_percentage}) * {total_holes} = <<({filled_percentage})*{total_holes}={holes_filled}>>{holes_filled} holes, were filled in with dirt.
Of the original {total_holes} holes, {total_holes}-{holes_filled}=<<{total_holes}-{holes_filled}={holes_unfilled}>>{holes_unfilled} holes remain unfilled.
